trans-unit.source: Base class for asymmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: 非對稱金鑰的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this class when [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] is running under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 當 [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] 在部分信任下執行時，您無法使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的非對稱演算法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使用私密金鑰來建立演算法，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指定的非對稱密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" />，表示指定的非對稱密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, <see langword="true" /> is passed into the <paramref name="privateKey" /> parameter, as a private key is typically required for decryption.
trans-unit.target: 通常會將 <see langword="true" /> 傳入 <paramref name="privateKey" /> 參數，因為解密時通常會需要私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> 類別的靜態欄位，即可指定演算法。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得會產生數位簽章之雜湊的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm" /> that generates hashes for digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm" />，它會產生數位簽章的雜湊。

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> 類別的靜態欄位，即可指定演算法。

trans-unit.source: The deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 數位簽章的變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得數位簽章的變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> that represents the deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" />，表示數位簽章的變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: A signature deformatter is typically used to verify a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 簽章變形項通常會用來驗證數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> 類別的靜態欄位，即可指定演算法。

trans-unit.source: The formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 數位簽章的格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得數位簽章的格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter" /> that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter" />，表示數位簽章的格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a signature formatter is used to generate a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 簽章格式器通常會用來產生數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> 類別的靜態欄位，即可指定演算法。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether the private key is available.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得指出是否可使用私密金鑰的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the private key is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使用私密金鑰，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
